alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 5:04PM MST until August 10 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 502 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms continuing northwest of Peach Springs. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Rock Canyon, Truxton Wash, Diamond Creek, Peach Springs Wash, Spencer Canyon, and Lost Man Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Diamond Creek Campground and Peach Springs. - This includes the following roads... Route 66 between mile markers 98 and 106. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
